item.title: Software engineer, programmer or wizard
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Software engineer, programmer or wizard Introduction I have been named many things (with respect to my profession) some of them were not actually correct. Should I correct people? Should I be worried about this? Naming They say that naming something creates it. Does being called a Software Engineer increases our work level? Does it give more respect profession-wise? As our discipline evolves, we have had many names from programmers, to software developers, software engineers, or even wizards!
